Docs.summary: Provides supporting types for interoperation between [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] and other technologies such as [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] and provides base classes for other specific interoperation scenarios involving [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
